QuestData.Title: Vision of Air
QuestData.Description: Here, $n, I've attuned the primal to you.$B$BOpen your soul to it in the presence of my totem of air and concentrate upon the fate of Farseer Grimwalker.$B$BThe spirit of the wind touches all; with any luck you will be granted a vision.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Imperean's Primal to perform a ritual at Snarlfang's Totem at Bor'gorok Outpost to gain information concerning Farseer Grimwalker.$B$BAfterward, speak with Spirit Talker Snarlfang.
QuestData.CompletionText: When you feel that you have seen enough, return the primal to me.
QuestData.RewardText: They've shackled his spirit. $n, we have to put an end to his torture!$B$BYou must descend into the bowels of Magmoth and find a way to free him!
